titles.title: A bill to authorize the expansion of the National Air and Space Museum at Baltimore-Washington International Airport or Washington Dulles International Airport.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Referred to Subcommittee on Libraries and Memorials.
Executive Comment Requested from Smithsonian, DOT, OMB.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.

bill.summary: 12/11/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Smithsonian Institution to develop a master plan for expansion of the National Air and Space Museum at Washington Dulles International Airport or at Baltimore-Washington International Airport that will not interfere with the operations of the airport. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1988 and 1989 for master planning activities.
